leads.lead_text: Cypsela oblong, c. 1 mm long, hispid; fruiting calyx 1–6-lobed, c. as long as cypsela
Cypsela subglobose, c. 2 mm long, glabrous or glabrescent; fruiting calyx 1-lobed or rudimentary, much shorter than cypsela
